entry.title: Bitcoin Inventor Satoshi Nakamoto Emails Revealed in Court
entry.summary: Fresh Satoshi Nakamoto lore emerges as cypherpunk Adam Back shares 2008-2009 emails with the Bitcoin inventor.

entry.title: Coinbase Says It's Still Accessible in Nigeria Despite Reported Crypto Ban
entry.summary: Nigerian authorities are reportedly blocking citizens' access to popular crypto trading platforms.

entry.title: Coinbase Backs Grayscale's Ethereum ETF: 'Virtually Identical' to Bitcoin ETFs
entry.summary: Citing Ethereum's technical configuration and market capitalization, Coinbase believes the SEC should approve an ETH spot ETF.

entry.title: 'Pirate Nation' Studio Reveals Network for Fully On-Chain Games on Arbitrum
entry.summary: Proof of Play’s Multichain network will power fully on-chain games, starting with Pirate Nation, but will open up to other developers.

entry.title: Serotonin CEO: Luxury Brands Can Make Metaverse 'Beautiful and Fulfilling'
entry.summary: Luxury brands gathered at Decrypt and Rug Radio's R HAUS in Paris to discuss the future of Web3 luxury and fashion.

entry.title: 'Fair Value of Bitcoin Is Still Zero,' Say European Central Bank Officials
entry.summary: This isn't a new sentiment. In November 2022 the same authors declared that Bitcoin was on the "road to irrelevance."

entry.title: Beyond $69K: What’s the Real Price Bitcoin Has to Reach to Beat Its All-Time High?
entry.summary: A single Bitcoin doesn’t buy what it used to. Here’s how the asset fares when measured up against inflation in the U.S. economy.

entry.title: Bitcoin Flat Ahead of New US Jobless Claims and Housing Data
entry.summary: Even with good news in equities markets, $53,000 "will likely be a tough resistance to break" for Bitcoin, said a Bitbank analyst.

entry.title: You Can Now Play Nintendo 64 Games on Bitcoin, Thanks to This Ordinals Project
entry.summary: Pizza Ninjas brings an N64 emulator to the Bitcoin blockchain after success with the SNES—with better compression, to boot.

entry.title: Ronin Adds 'Kaidro' Role-Playing Game Following 'Pixels' Ethereum Token Launch
entry.summary: Originally planned for Immutable X, the webcomic-based Kaidro game will instead launch on Ronin, home of Pixels and Axie Infinity.

entry.title: NVIDIA Earnings Blow Past Estimates, Mark ‘Tipping Point’ for AI
entry.summary: AI-related stocks and tokens also saw significant price jumps, fueled by the chipmaker's good news.

entry.title: $150 Million Venture Fund: Why Hack VC Remains Bullish on Crypto and Web3
entry.summary: Building upon its $200 million seed round, the firm has raised $150 million for its first venture fund.

entry.title: Nifty Island's New Quest Lets Gamers Boost Their Play-to-Airdrop Rewards
entry.summary: Rising blockchain game Nifty Island has launched a new in-game quest that will let players earn Legendary Palm NFTs—and juice their airdrops.

entry.title: ChatGPT Went ‘Off the Rails’ With Wild Hallucinations, But OpenAI Says It's Fixed
entry.summary: Reddit and Twitter users highlighted ChatGPT’s “nonsensical” behavior Tuesday as OpenAI worked to resolve the issue.

entry.title: Kakao's Metabora Joins Gaming Giants Ubisoft, Sega on Oasys Chain
entry.summary: One week after Oasys hit a new all-time high price, it has added another notable gaming firm to join its growing stable.

entry.title: What the Bitcoin Halving and Bitcoin ETFs Mean for Supply and Demand
entry.summary: The upcoming halving is designed to reduce the rate of new Bitcoin available on the market. It's just one of many reasons to be bullish, ETF issuers say.

entry.title: Google Has a New Open-Source AI Model—Can It Compete With Meta's Llama-2?
entry.summary: Google's Gemma is one day old and is already trending on AI leaderboards and beating Meta’s models across the most popular benchmarks.

entry.title: Pudgy Penguins Have Sold $10 Million Worth of Toys—Now Walmart Wants More
entry.summary: A second line of Pudgy Penguins NFT toys will launch in an expanded pact with Walmart that includes over 50% more stores.

entry.title: Elizabeth Warren 'Not Afraid' of Running Against Pro-Crypto Opponent
entry.summary: Sen. Elizabeth Warren (D-MA) said in a campaign email she's "not afraid" of running against a pro-crypto opponent.

entry.title: Yuga Labs Founder Garga Returns as CEO to ‘Unshackle’ Bored Ape Team
entry.summary: Big changes are coming as Greg “Garga” Solano takes the helm at Yuga Labs, apparently pushing out Daniel Alegre in the process.

entry.title: SEC Crypto Unit Leader Resigns After Spearheading Coinbase Lawsuit
entry.summary: Ladan Stewart once led federal lawsuits against Ripple and Coinbase, but may now turn crypto advocate in the private sector.

entry.title: Celsius Founder Mashinsky Says He's Sticking With Bankman-Fried’s Lawyers: Report
entry.summary: Alex Mashinsky reportedly said he would waive potential conflicts of interest.

entry.title: Portal Launch Set as Binance Offers 50 Million Ethereum Gaming Token Rewards
entry.summary: Portal’s cross-chain gaming token picks a date after the airdrop push, with the price estimated above $1 in pre-market trading.

entry.title: Esports Giant Team Liquid Launching Fan Rewards Platform on Sui
entry.summary: League of Legends and Counter-Strike juggernaut Team Liquid will roll out an enhanced engagement platform on Sui with Mysten Labs.

entry.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Look Bullish, But Are Navigating Uncertain Waters
entry.summary: Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH) have been gaining for weeks, but encountered some resistance while traders wait for U.S. Fed hints.

entry.title: This Ohio Candidate Welcomes AI In His Political Campaign—Will Voters?
entry.summary: A London startup's AI models focus on politics despite regulatory scrutiny over deepfakes and voter misinformation campaigns.

entry.title: Crypto Super PAC Fairshake Raised $6.8 Million From Winklevoss Twins and VCs in January
entry.summary: The super PAC's other January donors included VC firms Electric Capital and Blockchain Capital, according to a Federal Election Commission report.

entry.title: Circle Axes Support for USDC on Tron, Citing 'Risk Management'
entry.summary: The stablecoin issuer said that its decision, "aligns with our efforts to ensure that USDC remains trusted, transparent and safe."

entry.title: CME Group Debuts Bitcoin, Ethereum Futures For Europe
entry.summary: With U.S. dollar-denominated funds surging, the derivatives marketplace pitches a euro-based version.

entry.title: Michael Saylor Isn't Selling: ‘Bitcoin Is the Exit Strategy’
entry.summary: The MicroStrategy co-founder highlights Bitcoin ETFs' lure on institutional funds, signaling a significant shift in capital investments.

entry.title: Pixels Review: Should You Play the Buzzy Crypto Farming Game?
entry.summary: REVIEW: Ronin game Pixels is shining in the crypto spotlight after the token launch, but is there a fun game behind all that hype?

entry.title: Metaverse Games With 40,000 Players in the Same Space? The Tech Is Coming
entry.summary: Improbable's Chief Product Officer likened the expansive metaverse experience to "a digital Glastonbury or a digital Coachella."

entry.title: LockBit Ransomware Gang Broken Up After Taking $120 Million in Bitcoin
entry.summary: U.S. agencies sanction two Russian nationals and 10 total Bitcoin and Ethereum wallets, and say victims can get help with recovery.

entry.title: Spain Gets $2.1 Billion Boost for AI and Cloud Infrastructure From Microsoft
entry.summary: The company will build data centers in Madrid and Aragón —the same communities chosen by Amazon to host similar services.

entry.title: ‘Heroes of Mavia’ Ethereum Game Token Plunges Two Days After Hitting All-Time High
entry.summary: The MAVIA token tied to rising crypto game Heroes of Mavia dropped a steep 26% just 48 hours after reaching a new peak.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETF Market Will Shrink Before It Expands, Says 21Shares President
entry.summary: The gap between the biggest Bitcoin ETF issuers and the rest may lead the market to consolidate around the biggest players, says 21Shares President Ophelia Snyder.

entry.title: 'Pixels' Founder Luke Barwikowski on the Game's Wild Rise and Ronin Move
entry.summary: Ahead of the PIXEL token launch, Pixels game founder Luke Barwikowski joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss the hectic last few months—and why the game migrated between Ethereum scaling networks, from Polygon to Ronin.

entry.title: How Arbitrum Won the 'ApeChain' Vote for an ApeCoin Ethereum Scaler
entry.summary: Offchain Labs co-founder and CEO Steven Goldfeder joined Rug Radio's "FOMO Hour" to discuss the ApeCoin DAO's vote to create an Ethereum layer-2 gaming network on Arbitrum for the Bored Ape Yacht Club ecosystem.

entry.title: Recommend-To-Earn: Tokenizing Travel Recommendations with Sam Simmons
entry.summary:
Reza is joined by Sam Simmons, founder of MintPass.
They discuss: - The Parallels between Professional Poker and Crypto - The profitability of Ethics - The "Recommend-To-Earn" economy

entry.title: The Collected: Grant Riven Yun's Journey Through Art and Medicine
entry.summary: The Collected's Rachel Wilkins joins digital artist Grant Riven Yun to explore his remarkable journey blending art with medical studies, to achieve over $2 million in sales.

entry.title: Nifty Island Co-Founder on Why Play-to-Airdrop Is the Game's 'Booster Rocket'
entry.summary: Nifty Island co-founder Charles Smith joins Decrypt Culture Editor Andrew Hayward to discuss the game's play-to-airdrop campaign, why token incentives are so important to getting crypto games off the ground, and how the team plans to sustain its growth going forward.

entry.title: Pixels: The Hot Crypto Game and Airdrop Explained in One Minute or Less
entry.summary: Rug Radio Creator and crypto influencer AshleyDCan explains the popular Ronin farming game Pixels and details around the upcoming PIXEL token airdrop.

entry.title: Ethereum Scaler Blast Explained in One Minute or Less
entry.summary: Rug Radio Creator and crypto influencer AshleyDCan explains Ethereum layer-2 scaling network Blast, from the creators of top NFT marketplace Blur, including its upcoming airdrop and how to participate.

entry.title: Pixels Founder: Why PIXEL Token Launch Feels Like 'Day One' for Ronin Game
entry.summary: Luke Barwikowski, founder of farming game Pixels on Ronin, joins Decrypt Culture Editor Andrew Hayward to discuss the incoming launch of the PIXEL token and why he sees it as such a turning point for the rising blockchain game.

entry.title: Animoca’s Yat Siu: How Crypto Gaming Gains Mass Adoption
entry.summary: Yat Siu, CEO and co-founder of Animoca Brands, joins the FOMO Hour to discuss his view of the Web3 gaming space, how 2024 is already shaping up to be a big year for crypto gaming, the importance of education in the Web3 space, and much, much more.

entry.title: Shrapnel STX1 Early Access Gameplay
entry.summary: Gameplay footage from the STX1 early access gameplay demo of Shrapnel, a first-person shooter built on Avalanche.

entry.title: Farcaster: Has Decentralized Social Media Finally Arrived?
entry.summary: Rug Radio creator Benjamin White digs into the rise of Farcaster, the decentralized social media platform that's challenging Twitter following the launch of its Frames feature. Is this the decentralized social media app that finally clicks with the masses?

entry.title: Why Gmoney Took Out a $1 Million Loan on a CryptoPunks NFT
entry.summary: Pseudonymous NFT collector and entrepreneur Gmoney joined Rug Radio's live "FOMO Hour" show to discuss why he took out a $1 million loan on one of the most recognizable CryptoPunks NFTs around.

entry.title: Solana Hunger Games: Explained in One Minute or Less
entry.summary: Rug Radio Creator and crypto influencer AshleyDCan explains the latest sensation taking over timelines on Crypto Twitter, Solana Hunger Games. The new "crypto AR" game from GG.zip is backed by Delphi and plans to launch in the spring. Here's what going on, explained in one minute or less.

entry.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: Gala Marija Vrbanic
entry.summary:
Tribute Brand founder and CEO Gala Marija Vrbanic joins 5 Questions With SCENE to discuss not just fashion, but graffiti crimes, fishless aquariums, and the apparently emergent sport of wind chasing.
Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.

entry.title: Why Is Everyone Talking About Jupiter on Solana?
entry.summary: Rug Radio Creator and crypto influencer AshleyDCan explains why the crypto world can't stop talking about Solana's Jupiter. What is JUP? Who qualified for the airdrop? And will there be another round?

entry.title: Jupiter Founder Meow Unloads on the Solana Airdrop 'FUD'
entry.summary: Meow, the pseudonymous founder of Solana DEX aggregator Jupiter, made a surprise appearance today on Rug Radio's "FOMO Hour" to address the JUP airdrop "FUD," and explain why he believes the backlash to the team's launch liquidity pool is unfounded.

entry.title: The Future is Multichain w/ Jason Trikakis from Holograph
entry.summary:
Reza is joined by Jason from Holograph.xyz
They dive into the multichain future and what that means for NFTs, DeFi, RWAs, and more.

entry.title: How Generative AI Makes for a More Inclusive Metaverse in 'Avalon'
entry.summary: Avalon Chief Product Officer Jeffrey Butler speaks with Decrypt reporter Jason Nelson about the use of generative AI within the upcoming game and how it will help players from anywhere and everywhere truly see themselves represented in the online world.

entry.title: How a Perfume DAO Crafted a 'Scent of the Metaverse'
entry.summary: Rook Perfumes founder Nadeem Crowe and Melissa Gilmour of Web3 creative agency Lily & Piper join Stephen Graves to talk about how they created a fragrance with a DAO and brought it to the shelves of London department store Harvey Nichols.

entry.title: Trash-Fueled BTC Mining w/ Chris Bennet
entry.summary:
Reza is joined by Chris Bennet from Spacestation Investments.
They discuss: - Mining BTC with energy generated from landfills - How to increase deal-flow - Running an agency vs running a fund
